Execution of binaries or scripts signed.Action: Monitor process creation events (Windows Event ID 4688) for binaries or scripts with signing information. Extract certificate details (issuer, subject, thumbprint, validity). Compare issuer against known trusted authorities. Identify processes signed by untrusted or self-signed certificates. Analyze frequency distribution of new or unusual certificate signers across endpoints.

Installation of new or untrusted root ce.Action: Monitor process creation events (Windows Event ID 4688) for execution of utilities like certutil.exe with parameters used for adding root certificates. Analyze the temporal correlation of certutil execution or similar activity with other suspicious activities on the host.
